Uses of Interface
com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.channels.EventsOutChannel

  • Packages that use EventsOutChannel 
    Package Description
    com.opencredo.concursus.cassandra.events
    This package provides Cassandra implementations of the EventPersister, EventRetriever, AggregateCatalogue and EventStore interfaces, for persisting and retrieving event histories and keeping track of "live" aggregates.
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.batching
    Provides the EventBatch interface, which represents a collection of Events that are to be processed together, and two concrete implementations, ProcessingEventBatch (which sends batched events to an EventBatchProcessor on completion) and BufferingEventBatch (which stores up events for replaying to an interested observer on completion, before passing the batch on to some other EventsOutChannel).
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.channels
    Event channels are how Events enter and leave the system.
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.dispatching
    Provides the EventBus interface, which simplifies creating batches of events and dispatching them collectively into the system.
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.logging
    Provides the EventLog interface, which represents an object that will assign a processing id to each Event in a collection of events, write them to persistent storage and then return a list of processed events (from which duplicates may have been removed).
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.persisting
    Provides the EventPersister interface for an object that writes events to a persistent store.
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.processing
    When an EventBatch completes, it is sent to an EventBatchProcessor (interface provided by this package).
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.storage
    Defines the EventStore interface, which represents an event store which can persist and retrieve events, and provides an InMemoryEventStore implementation.
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.json.events.channels  

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.cassandra.events

      Classes in com.opencredo.concursus.cassandra.events that implement EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CassandraEventPersister
      An EventPersister that writes events into Cassandra.

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.batching

      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.batching with parameters of type EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default EventBatch EventBatch.bufferingTo(EventsOutChannel outChannel)
      Buffer this event batch and replay buffered events to the supplied EventsOutChannel on completion.

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.channels

      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.channels that return EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default EventsOutChannel EventsOutChannel.filter(java.util.function.Predicate<Event> eventFilter)
      Filter this channel with the supplied Predicate.
      default EventsOutChannel EventOutChannel.toEventsOutChannel()
      Convert into an EventsOutChannel that handles batches of events (by passing each @{link Event} in the batch into this EventOutChannel, one at a time).

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.dispatching

      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.dispatching that return EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default EventsOutChannel EventBus.toEventsOutChannel() 
      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.dispatching with parameters of type EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void EventBus.notifying(EventsOutChannel outChannel, java.util.function.Consumer<EventBus> busConsumer)
      Create a copy of this event bus that notifies the supplied EventsOutChannel on batch completion.

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.logging

      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.logging with parameters of type EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EventLog EventLog.loggingTo(EventsOutChannel eventsOutChannel)
      Creates an EventLog that assigns processing ids to Events, then dispatches them through an EventsOutChannel.

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.persisting

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EventPersister
      An EventsOutChannel that writes Events into a persistent store.

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.processing

      Subinterfaces of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.processing 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EventBatchProcessor
      Processes the Events collected in an EventBatch on batch completion.
      Classes in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.processing that implement EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PublishingEventBatchProcessor
      On EventBatch completion, writes the Events in the batch to an EventLog, then publishes the logged events to an EventPublisher.
      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.processing with parameters of type EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EventBatchProcessor EventBatchProcessor.forwardingTo(EventsOutChannel outChannel)
      Create an EventBatchProcessor that forwards the events to the supplied EventsOutChannel

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.storage

      Subinterfaces of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.storage 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EventStore
      A store of Events, into which they can be persisted and from which they can be retrieved.
      Classes in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.storage that implement EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComposedEventStore
      An EventStore composed of an EventPersister and an EventRetriever.
      class  InMemoryEventStore
      An in-memory EventStore, primarily for testing purposes.

    • Uses of EventsOutChannel in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.json.events.channels

      Classes in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.json.events.channels that implement EventsOutChannel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JsonEventsOutChannel
      A channel through which collections of Events can be sent out of the system in JSON serialised form.
